dialog.description: This permanently deletes the group, members, and invitations. This action cannot be undone.

dialog.title: Leave this group?
dialog.description: You will leave this group and lose access to member-only actions. You can join again later if allowed.

promoteDialog.title: Promote {memberDisplayName} to admin?
promoteDialog.description: They will be able to edit this group, invite members, and manage join requests.

kickDialog.description: They will lose access to member-only actions and can join again later if allowed.

AddMembersPopup.description: Invite friends to join this group.

event.updateCalendarError: Could not update the event in Google Calendar.

metadata.title: About | Boardify
metadata.description: Learn what Boardify is and how it helps you organize game nights.

header.title: About Boardify
header.description: Boardify helps you decide what to play faster by organizing your games, friends, and groups in one place.

solve.title: What It Solves
solve.description: Stop guessing what everyone can play. Boardify surfaces shared options quickly.

flow.title: How It Works
flow.description: Build your library, connect with friends, and join groups to compare collections.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Profile visibility and invitation flows are designed so you control who sees what.

author.title: From The Author
author.paragraph1: I built Boardify after repeating the same pre-game ritual every week: endless chat messages, unclear player counts, and lots of last-minute what can we actually play moments.
author.paragraph2: The goal was not just to list games, but to reduce friction before meeting friends. Boardify brings collections, availability, and group context together so choosing a game feels quick, fair, and collaborative instead of chaotic.

metadata.title: Contact | Boardify
metadata.description: Get in touch with the Boardify team for support, bugs, or feature ideas.

header.title: Contact
header.description: Need help, found a bug, or want to suggest a feature? Reach out and include as much context as possible.

support.title: General Support
support.description: Account issues, onboarding, or questions about how Boardify works.

bugs.title: Bug Reports
bugs.description: Share steps, expected result, and actual result so we can reproduce quickly.

features.title: Feature Requests
features.description: Tell us the problem you want solved and how you currently work around it.
